column2: Alot of people belive Blue but I would say Green. Having fun is the most important!

column1: Whats a good commander to build around
column2: The most popular commander is Atraxa and there are many ways to build around her
The lastest set is Zedndikar rising. It released September 25th 2020
The Gatewatch consists of 5 Planeswalkers including Jace Chandra Nissa and Agani
An instant can be cast any time you have priority over your opponents including on their turns
Lands are used by tapping them 90 degrees producing one mana of the lands colour unless stated otherwise
Remeber reading the card explains the card
It is the start of your turn where you untap your lands and draw a card from the top of your library
